mapper.select: SELECT id_,canlendar_id_,assign_type_,assign_id_,calendar_name_,assign_user_name_ FROM ( SELECT ca.id_,ca.canlendar_id_,ca.assign_type_,ca.assign_id_, cc.name_ as calendar_name_,ca.assign_user_name_ FROM portal_cal_assign ca INNER JOIN portal_calendar cc ON ca.canlendar_id_ = cc.id_ WHERE ca.assign_type_ = 1 UNION SELECT ca.id_,ca.canlendar_id_,ca.assign_type_,ca.assign_id_, cc.name_ as calendar_name_,ca.assign_user_name_ FROM portal_cal_assign ca INNER JOIN portal_calendar cc ON ca.canlendar_id_ = cc.id_ WHERE ca.assign_type_ = 2 ) temp WHERE id_=#{id}
